title: Smart Data Models - Noise Level observed schema
description: An observation of those acoustic parameters that estimate noise pressure levels at a certain place and time.

dateObserved.description: Property. The date and time of this observation represented by an ISO8601 interval.

dateObservedFrom.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. Observation period start date and time.

dateObservedTo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Observation period end date and time. See dateObserved.

sonometerClass.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Class of sonometer (0, 1, 2) according to ANSI used for taking this observation

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refDevice.description: Relationship. A reference to the device which captured this observation.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refPointOfInterest.description: Relationship. A reference to a point of interest associated to this observation.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refWeatherObserved.description: Relationship. Reference to the associated weather conditions.

LAS.description: Property. The frequency weighted sound level (A-weighting) for a slow sound, one second mor more up and down.

LAeq.description: Property. The frequency weighted Leq sound level (A-weighting).

LAeq_d.description: Property. Acoustic Level frequency weigthed (A-weghting) equivalent for  a day

LAmax.description: Property. Acoustic level frequency weigthed (A-weghting) maximum sound level

obstacles.description: Property. Type of potential obstacles between the sensor and the noise source.

heightAverage.description: Property. Type of potential obstacles between the sensor and the noise source. Units:'meters'

distanceAverage.description: Property. Average distance between sensor and potential noise sources. Units:'meters'
